Hi everyone  sorry for a noob question. Can I ask for HSBC ega account once I do the 5 transactions and 2K incremental deposit  will I get notified that the 1% cash back is triggered?
Anyone knows if Evol is applicable forZym mobile payment (count as online?)Anytime fitness gym memeveship?

You will get a sms few days later   it will be something like belowHSBCSG(1/2): You've qualified for the HSBC Everyday+ Rewards Programme! From now until 29FEB2024  enjoy 1% Cashback on your HSBC card spends and GIRO billHSBCSG(2/2): payments  and 1% p.a. Bonus Interest when you save with us. Visit HSBC SG Website > Banking > Everyday Global Account for details. T&Cs apply.
